thread.title: India v South Africa live cricket scores: Coverage of the first Twenty20
thread.title_full: India v South Africa live cricket scores: Coverage of the first Twenty20 | DailyTelegraph

author: dailytelegraph.com
title: India v South Africa live cricket scores: Coverage of the first Twenty20
text:
TWO of the world’s best Twenty20 sides kick off a three-match series tonight in the city of Dharamsala in India.
Some of the game’s biggest stars will take to the field in the first Twenty20 tonight at 11:30pm AEST, with India boasting a batting line-up that features MS Dhoni, Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, and South Africa one that features Faf du Plessis, AB de Villiers and JP Duminy.
With next year’s World T20 in India fast approaching, the series is ideal preparation for South Africa, while for the home side it is a return to a format it hasn’t seen much of in the last year.
Follow the action in our live blog below or get ball-by-ball coverage in our match centre.
